TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed RecognitionConfidence extends System.Enum

Docs.summary: Specifies the confidence level that the determines for a particular ink gesture.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML Text Usage This class is not typically used in XAML. ## Examples The following example demonstrates how to identify a gesture on an . This example assumes that there is an called `inkCanvas1` and that its event has been connected to the event handler in this example.
